{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.16522v1", "title": "On Bell numbers of type $D$", "summary": "In this paper, we will introduce Bell numbers $D(n)$ of type $D$ as an
analogue to the classical Bell numbers related to all the partitions of the set
$[n]$. Then based on a signed set partition of type $D$, we will construct the
recurrence relations of Bell numbers $D(n)$. In addition, we deduce the
exponential generating function for $D(n)$. Finally, we will provide an
explicit formula for $D(n)$.", "main_category": "math.CO", "categories": "math.CO", "published": "2025-04-23T08:46:10Z"}
